database_info.data_source: Institute of Medicine (IOM) Dietary Reference Intakes, FDA, USDA, Clinical Research
database_info.notes: All values are US RDA/AI and UL. Optimal ranges based on clinical research for therapeutic supplementation. Conditionally essential nutrients flagged for special populations.

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL applies to preformed vitamin A only, not beta-carotene
warnings: Pregnant women should not exceed 3000 mcg RAE
High doses may increase fracture risk
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Smokers may need higher intake due to increased oxidative stress

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on GI disturbance; higher doses may be tolerated
warnings: Can cause kidney stones in susceptible individuals
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Smokers need 35mg additional daily due to increased oxidative stress
interaction_warnings: May interfere with copper absorption at high doses

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on hypercalcemia risk
warnings: Monitor calcium levels with high doses
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Many adults may need higher doses than RDA, especially those with limited sun exposure. Needs cofactors like magnesium and vitamin K2.

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL applies to synthetic alpha-tocopherol only
warnings: Avoid high doses with blood thinners
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Smokers may need higher intake due to increased oxidative stress

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of observed adverse effects
warnings: Consult doctor if on blood thinners
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: K2 (MK-7) form may be more effective than K1
toxicity_symptoms: No known toxicity from natural forms

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of observed adverse effects
warnings: Large doses may cause fatigue or irritability
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Alcoholics and elderly may need higher doses
toxicity_symptoms: No known toxicity from oral supplements

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of observed adverse effects
warnings: High doses may cause bright yellow urine (harmless)
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Athletes and elderly may need higher doses
toxicity_symptoms: No known toxicity from oral supplements

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL applies to nicotinic acid form only, not niacinamide
warnings: High doses of nicotinic acid cause flushing
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Niacinamide form doesn't cause flushing

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on peripheral neuropathy risk
warnings: High doses may cause nerve damage
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Elderly may need higher doses for optimal health

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL applies to folic acid from supplements and fortified foods only
warnings: High doses may mask B12 deficiency
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Women of reproductive age need 400 mcg synthetic folic acid daily for neural tube defect prevention. Natural forms (folate) are not subject to the UL.
nutrient_recommendations.notes: For women of reproductive age who could become pregnant, 400 mcg of synthetic folic acid daily from fortified foods or supplements is recommended in addition to dietary folate.

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of observed adverse effects
warnings: High doses may cause acne in some individuals
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Elderly, vegans, and those with absorption issues may need higher doses
toxicity_symptoms: No known toxicity from oral supplements

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of observed adverse effects
warnings: High doses may interfere with lab tests
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Often used in much higher doses for hair, skin, and nail health
toxicity_symptoms: No known toxicity from oral supplements

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of observed adverse effects
warnings: Very high doses may cause diarrhea
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Often used in higher doses for stress and adrenal support

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on hypotension and fishy body odor
warnings: High doses may cause fishy body odor
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Most Americans don't get adequate choline from diet alone

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official RDA or UL established
warnings: High doses may cause nausea or diarrhea
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Often used in higher doses for PCOS and mental health

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on kidney stone risk and cardiovascular concerns
warnings: High doses may increase heart disease risk
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Take with vitamin D and K2 for optimal absorption and bone health

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL applies to supplemental magnesium only, not food sources
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Most Americans don't get adequate magnesium from diet
interaction_warnings: May affect absorption of some antibiotics

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on GI distress; higher doses may be needed therapeutically
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Women of reproductive age need more iron than men

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on copper interference and immune dysfunction
warnings: High doses may interfere with copper absorption
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Often used in higher doses for immune support

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on liver damage risk
warnings: High doses may cause liver damage
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Often overlooked but essential for iron metabolism
interaction_warnings: High zinc intake can cause copper deficiency
May be affected by vitamin C

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on selenosis (hair and nail brittleness)
warnings: High doses may cause hair loss
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Important antioxidant mineral often overlooked

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on thyroid dysfunction
warnings: High doses may cause thyroid problems
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Essential for thyroid function, many are deficient

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of observed adverse effects
warnings: High doses may cause liver damage
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Often marketed for blood sugar support

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on neurotoxicity from inhalation studies
warnings: High doses may cause neurological problems
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Usually adequate in diet, supplementation rarely needed

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on reproductive effects in animals
warnings: High doses may cause gout-like symptoms
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Usually adequate in diet, rarely deficient
deficiency_symptoms: Rarely occurs, may cause metabolic issues

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on calcium-phosphorus imbalance
warnings: High doses may interfere with calcium absorption
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Usually adequate in diet, rarely supplemented

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of observed adverse effects from food sources
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Most Americans don't get adequate potassium

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established but <2300mg recommended for health
warnings: High intake linked to high blood pressure
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Most Americans consume too much sodium
interaction_warnings: May interact with blood pressure medications

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on hypertension risk
warnings: High doses may increase blood pressure
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Usually adequate in diet, rarely supplemented alone
interaction_warnings: May interact with blood pressure medications

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: UL based on dental fluorosis risk
warnings: High doses may cause dental fluorosis
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Usually obtained from water and toothpaste

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official RDA established, UL based on reproductive effects
warnings: High doses may cause reproductive effects
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Often used for bone health and hormone support

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official RDA established, UL based on toxicity studies
warnings: High doses may cause GI upset
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Often used for blood sugar support

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official RDA established, AI based on cardiovascular benefits
warnings: High doses may increase bleeding risk
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: EPA and DHA are the most important forms

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official RDA established, generally considered safe
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Production decreases with age, ubiquinol form preferred for >40 years

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official RDA established, generally considered safe
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: R-form is more bioavailable than synthetic racemic form
deficiency_symptoms: Not essential nutrient, no deficiency symptoms

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official RDA established, generally considered safe
conditionally_essential_for: Those with heart or metabolic conditions
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Semi-essential amino acid, may become essential during stress

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official RDA or UL established, GRAS status up to 20mg/day
warnings: May cause yellowing of skin at very high doses
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Important for eye health, often combined with zeaxanthin
interaction_warnings: May enhance effects of other carotenoids

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official RDA or UL established, often combined with lutein
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Critical for macular health, concentrated in eye tissues

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official RDA or UL established, GRAS status
warnings: May cause orange skin discoloration at very high doses
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Powerful antioxidant, better absorbed with fat

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: Conditionally essential nutrient, no official UL established
warnings: Kidney function should be monitored at high doses
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Essential for vegans/vegetarians, synthesized endogenously

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: Conditionally essential nutrient, no official UL established
warnings: May cause fishy body odor at high doses
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Essential for vegans/vegetarians, synthesized from lysine and methionine

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official UL established
warnings: May cause nausea or agitation in some individuals
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: More bioavailable form of carnitine that crosses blood-brain barrier

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official UL established
warnings: May cause headaches in sensitive individuals
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Highly bioavailable source of choline that crosses blood-brain barrier

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No official UL established
warnings: Oral absorption is poor; liposomal or sublingual forms preferred
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Master antioxidant; precursor supplementation (NAC, glycine) often more effective than direct glutathione

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of observed adverse effects from food or water sources.
warnings: Inhalation is highly toxic; UL is not applicable to inhalation exposure.
Dermatitis can be caused by exposure.
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Trace mineral important for metabolic function, usually consumed in sufficient amounts from diet.
deficiency_symptoms: Rarely documented in humans; may impact liver and kidney function

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of observed adverse effects.
warnings: Inhalation of crystalline silica can cause silicosis.
Supplements should be amorphous silica forms.
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: A trace element believed to be important for bone and connective tissue health. No official RDA or AI.
deficiency_symptoms: May impact bone and collagen formation.
toxicity_symptoms: Generally considered safe from food and supplements.

nutrient_recommendations.ul_note: No UL established due to lack of adverse effects from food or water sources.
warnings: In concentrated form, can cause diarrhea in high doses.
nutrient_recommendations.special_considerations: Essential for many biological processes, including cartilage formation. Usually found in food and water and not a common deficiency concern.
toxicity_symptoms: Diarrhea and gastrointestinal distress from high concentrations in drinking water.
